import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import i from "./img/card.png"; function SellCards(props) { const rollArr = props.rollArr; return ( <>
Seller

{props.seller}

Roll Number

{props.rollno}

Hall

{props.hall}

Email Address

{props.email}

Phone Number

{props.phno}

Product type

{props.pdtype}

Product Description

{props.descp}

Selling Price(INR)

{props.price}

{(props.status === "close")? CLOSED : OPEN } CONTACT
) } export default SellCards
